text: 1.5: Sng 89.27; Ais 55.4; Zo 15.9; 18.37; Ef 1.20; Kor 1.18; 1 T 6.13; Hi 9.14; 1 Zo 1.7; 4.10; VB 3.14; 17.14Zisas Krais, ana za Fhe Bakɨme buni guarira bun nzuai guma ma. Ana za kha gumgi kharav, rimgiap, fhara khavgi guma ma. Ana vhɨra za kha nuianan ki ŋgui vhɨrve gari gumgir panin guma bakɨme ma. Ana vhɨra fhura nden korar muuŋv, nden ndavir muuŋrim, nde ndavi mbɨrav wari kɨri.
